sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Dictionary Upgrade (Feb 2022 Release)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var dictionaryArr = [
	{
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_delivery_location^element=name',
        'attribute': {
            'column_label': 'Address'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_delivery_location^element=location_status',
        'attribute': {
            'column_label': 'Address verification'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_delivery_location^element=location_approved',
        'attribute': {
            'column_label': 'Address approval'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_delivery_location^element=default',
        'attribute': {
            'column_label': 'User default location'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_delivery_location^element=preferred',
        'attribute': {
            'column_label': 'User saved location'
        }
    },
	{
        'query': 'name=sn_shop_delivery_location^element=office',
        'attribute': {
            'column_label': 'Work address'
        }
    }
];

var choiceArr = [{
        'query': 'element=location_status^name=sn_shop_delivery_location^value=unknown',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Pending review'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=location_status^name=sn_shop_delivery_location^value=valid',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Valid address'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=location_status^name=sn_shop_delivery_location^value=invalid',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Invalid address'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=location_approved^name=sn_shop_delivery_location^value=yes',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Company approved'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=location_approved^name=sn_shop_delivery_location^value=no',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Not approved'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=location_approved^name=sn_shop_delivery_location^value=one_time',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'One time approval'
        }
    }
];

var hintArr = [{
        'query': 'element=location_approved^name=sn_shop_delivery_location',
        'attribute': {
            'hint': 'Indicates that this delivery address can be used for user purchases'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=location_status^name=sn_shop_delivery_location',
        'attribute': {
            'hint': 'Indicates that this delivery address is a real shippable location'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=preferred^name=sn_shop_delivery_location',
        'attribute': {
            'hint': 'Indicates that the user saved the address to be used for future purchases'
        }
    }
];
dictionaryArr.forEach(updateDictionary);
choiceArr.forEach(updateChoice);
hintArr.forEach(updateHint);

function updateDictionary(obj) {
    var dictionaryGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    dictionaryGr.addEncodedQuery(obj.query);
    dictionaryGr.query();
    while (dictionaryGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(dictionaryGr, obj.attribute);
}

function updateChoice(choiceObj) {
    var documenationGr = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
    documenationGr.addEncodedQuery(choiceObj.query);
    documenationGr.query();
    while (documenationGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(documenationGr, choiceObj.attribute);
}
function updateHint(hintObj) {
    var documenationGr = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
    documenationGr.addEncodedQuery(hintObj.query);
    documenationGr.query();
    while (documenationGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(documenationGr, hintObj.attribute);
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-10-29 07:35:39</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>89664c747723301077f4d303be5a9914</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Dictionary Upgrade (Feb 2022 Release)</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">45f917bd533323007388ddeeff7b12b6</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">45f917bd533323007388ddeeff7b12b6</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_89664c747723301077f4d303be5a9914</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-12-07 04:53:12</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
